name: Veterans Healthcare Policy Institute
tweet: .@DeptVetAffairs is a leader in pioneering advances in patient safety, research, teaching, & care delivery. Its work has improved the health and well-being of not only, veterans but throughout the U.S. and the world. #VeteransGuide pic.twitter.com/6aEtd4FPfT

name: Veterans Healthcare Policy Institute
tweet: .@VeteransHealth assists more than 230,000 people every day at more than 1,200 sites of care and sees thousands more via virtual appointments. #VeteransGuide pic.twitter.com/8cNB5htqsp

name: Veterans Healthcare Policy Institute
tweet: .@VeteransHealth runs one of the largest U.S. medical simulation centers, the VHA SimLEARN National Simulation Center. #VeteransGuide pic.twitter.com/GLbffWNBnU

name: Veterans Healthcare Policy Institute
tweet: .@DeptVetAffairs has nearly 50,000 staff vacancies, w ~44k at @VeteransHealth. @SecWilkie has been insistent that it's not a top priority to fill those positions. But, that was before #COVID19. #VeteransGuide pic.twitter.com/fz4qLNwomr

name: Veterans Healthcare Policy Institute
tweet: @AFGENational and @NFFE_Union are critical to ensuring that @VeteransHealth workers stay safe and can continue to care for #veterans. http://stripes.com/news/veterans/unions-seek-more-protection-for-va-employees-after-workers-test-positive-for-coronavirus-1.622734 …

name: Veterans Healthcare Policy Institute
tweet: The @DeptVetAffairs is the closest thing the U.S. has to a national health care system. So why have officials allowed it to become chronically understaffed and failed to stock up on critical meds? #covid19 #coronavirus https://www.revealnews.org/article/understaffed-veterans-affairs-scrambles-to-confront-covid-19/ …

name: Veterans Healthcare Policy Institute
tweet: @realDonaldTrump & @SecWilkie "have overseen an unprecedented privatization push through the VA MISSION Act of 2018; ...done virtually nothing to fill 44,000 health care vacancies; & refused to install a permanent deputy undersecretary of health." #covid19 https://prospect.org/coronavirus/the-best-health-system-to-react-to-covid-19/ …

name: Veterans Healthcare Policy Institute
tweet: .@VeteransHealth has an ~300k employees – one-third of whom are veterans themselves. Outside of direct care providers, some of these #Veterans work as peer support specialists, while others are in non-clinical roles through the Compensated Work Therapy. #VeteransGuide pic.twitter.com/Na2yb4bdZm

name: Veterans Healthcare Policy Institute
tweet: Treating those who suffer from the wounds of war shouldn’t be controversial. Sign up for weekly news and analysis on evidence-based care for #veterans of the U.S. Armed Forces.  https://www.veteranspolicy.org/subscribe

name: Veterans Healthcare Policy Institute
tweet: .@VeteransHealth is not a hospital chain competing for market share or a collection of physician practices or specialty services. It is the nation’s largest, and only comprehensive, integrated health care system that has full public funding. #VeteranGuide #COVID19 pic.twitter.com/HsH9maMfdE

name: Veterans Healthcare Policy Institute
tweet: How is @DeptVetAffairs responding to #COVIDー19 around the United States? Take a look at our #list of #Veterans Affairs facilities and programs across the entire U.S. #healthcare system:  https://twitter.com/i/lists/1011373455114166272 …

tweet: Veterans’ health care impacts every American community. We bring you the stories power brokers in D.C. rarely discuss. Subscribe here:  https://www.veteranspolicy.org/subscribe

name: Veterans Healthcare Policy Institute
tweet: .@DeptVetAffairs is the best-positioned health care system to address the #CoronaCrisis. name: Veterans Healthcare Policy Institute
tweet: Providing the best #healthcare for America’s heroes shouldn’t be political. We weed through the propaganda to bring you the best reporting, studies, and analysis on #veteran’s #healthcare. Subscribe here:  https://www.veteranspolicy.org/subscribe

name: Veterans Healthcare Policy Institute
tweet: .@VeteransHealth assists more than 230,000 people every day at more than 1,200 sites of care. Via telehealth, it sees thousands more #veterans via virtual appointments. #VeteranGuide pic.twitter.com/4W8G4LRjfZ

tweet:

name: Veterans Healthcare Policy Institute
tweet: .@VeteransHealth is affiliated with more than 1,800 educational institutions, investing $900m annually to provide education and instruction to health care professionals-in-training. #VeteranGuide #Healthcare #Education pic.twitter.com/MQUP6CVQkj

name: Veterans Healthcare Policy Institute
tweet: .@VeteransHealth's Compensated Work Therapy program employs #veterans who are in recovery from mental health or substance abuse issues, and/or homelessness. An important part of a healthy life is a steady job that pays. #VeteranGuide pic.twitter.com/PHlD0PNIVA

name: Veterans Healthcare Policy Institute
tweet: Not all #veterans are eligible for @VeteransHealth care, despite what most civilian Americans may believe. Congress, @POTUS,  @DeptVetAffairs, and @VAVetBenefits are all responsible to some degree for deciding which veterans do and do not get care. #VeteranGuide pic.twitter.com/p1h1O15VOM
